entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
